steps.title: Cut the celery into sticks.
steps.content: Cut the celery into sticks. This means removing the base and the leaf ends. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Place the cut sticks into a bowl of iced water.
steps.content: Place the cut sticks into a bowl of iced water. [2] X Research source Leave for half an hour.

steps.title: Use.
steps.content: Use. The sticks should be revived and as good as new.

steps.title: Refresh the entire celery (head of celery).
steps.content: Refresh the entire celery (head of celery). If you need to revive all of the celery, cut a thin slice off the root end of the celery and stand this end in the bowl of ice water for up to half an hour. Again, it should revive well and be ready for immediate use. [3] X Research source
